abstract: Tells the delegate to transform the pasted or dropped text item.

declaration.code: @MainActor optional func textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_ textPasteConfigurationSupporting: any UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting, transform item: any UITextPasteItem)

overview:
## Discussion

This method is called for each text paste item during a paste or drop operation. You’re required to call one of the `setResult` methods (see Setting a text paste item’s result value) on `item`, but the call doesn’t have to be within the scope of the transform method. It can, for example, be part of the asynchronous handling code for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem/itemProvider], or it can be part of a completion block. You can make the call whenever you prefer.

It’s safe to use the provided [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem] object on any thread, but the transform method is always called on the main thread.

# textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_:transform:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate to transform the pasted or dropped text item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_ textPasteConfigurationSupporting: any UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting, transform item: any UITextPasteItem)
```

## Parameters

- **textPasteConfigurationSupporting**: The object that received the paste or drop request.
- **item**: The text paste item included in the paste or drop operation.

## Discussion

This method is called for each text paste item during a paste or drop operation. You’re required to call one of the `setResult` methods (see Setting a text paste item’s result value) on `item`, but the call doesn’t have to be within the scope of the transform method. It can, for example, be part of the asynchronous handling code for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem/itemProvider], or it can be part of a completion block. You can make the call whenever you prefer.

It’s safe to use the provided [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem] object on any thread, but the transform method is always called on the main thread.
title: textPasteConfigurationSupporting(_:transform:)
